identity: the general populace of Earth was unaware of Naga existence.
knownrelatives: Married at least once (husband unknown), Merro (son, deceased), Llyra (daughter-in-law)
occupation: At the time of his death Naga was the Emperor of Lemuria.
powers: Without the Serpent Crown Naga had the strength of an enhanced human, while wearing the Crown he possessed superhuman strength and abilities.
